title: Batman - The Television Series - Season 3 [Uncut] [WEB-DL 1080P]
description:
Batman - The Television Series - Season 3 [Uncut] [WEB-DL 1080P] [Subtitles Included]

The original Batman television series, from the 1960's has finally been released completely uncut and digitally remastered. 

In this torrent, you will find ALL season three episodes. And with this torrent, that concludes the 120 episodes from the series. All episodes are in mkv format. Unlike my previous uploads of this series, these epsisodes are in 1080P, directly downloaded from the web and of extremely high quality. Pretty much, this is what the Blu-ray version of the episodes look like.

In addition, subtitles are now available on these episodes. You can turn them on/off depending on the media player you opt to use (VLC, KM, etc...). You can also use the .srt file that I have included for each episode. I know that was a big deal to many of you, so I am glad I can provide the subtitles this time around.

You may ask why the file sizes are so large. That is because I have NOT compressed the episodes with any software, as I did not want to reduce the quality the episodes at all. These episodes are the genuine real deal and I hope people appreciate me uploading them.

Thanks to everyone who kept seeding the other uploads. I will continue to seed and hopefully others who can will do as well so none of the torrents die out. It has been fun doing this and bringing this classic show that we all love to others. Happy Holidays!

Enjoy as always. :)
